summary: Shawn Anderson (shawn@longtailfinancial.com) is the primary user. Based in Vancouver, BC. Runs Long Tail Financial. Works on regenerative AI, algorithmic trading, and multi-agent systems.
questions: What is Shawn's background before Long Tail Financial?
Who are the key collaborators in the RegenAI project?

summary: 17 MCP servers connected providing external capabilities: firecrawl, exa, brave-search, youtube-transcript, neon, regen-koi, graphiti-knowledge, postgres-elizaos, postgres-cognitive, filesystem, memory, everything, sequential-thinking, time, git, fetch, markitdown
questions: What is the KOI API and what does it do?

summary: System has 32GB RAM, RTX 4070 (12GB VRAM), NVMe storage. Running Pop!_OS (Linux 6.17.4). 12+ Claude Code sessions running simultaneously consuming ~12GB total.
questions: What is the total disk capacity?
How is GPU being utilized beyond Ollama?

summary: 24-agent ecosystem with specialized agents: perspective (backend-architect, systems-thinker), meta (agent-architect), operational (process-cartographer, temporal-validator), stewardship (librarian, archivist). AgentNet provides social layer for agent interaction.
questions: How do agents communicate in production?

summary: Running containers: falkordb_persistent (6380), graphiti-neo4j (7474/7687), autoflow-timescaledb, autoflow-redis, regenai-postgres (5435). Services: Ollama (11434), PostgreSQL (5432), Quartz journal (8080).
questions: Is there redundancy between FalkorDB and Neo4j?
What models are loaded in Ollama?

summary: Major projects: RegenAI (regenerative AI with Eliza framework), AutoFlow (algorithmic trading with $100k capital), cognitive-ecosystem (agent infrastructure), AgentNet (agent social network). Collaborators include Becca, Susanna, Gisel.
